cast.name: 迈克尔·斯特拉罕 Michael Strahan

director.name: Nathan S. Caswell Nathan S. Caswell

this_title: It's in the Game: Madden NFL Season 1
introduction: It’s one of the biggest video games of all time, a groundbreaking brand that became a worldwide phenomenon, spanning generations—but it almost never happened… Now, 36 years after the first game's release, EA SPORTS gives viewers unprecedented access to the makers of game that changed the game, and our culture too.S1 E1 CAN A COMPUTER MAKE YOU CRY?S1 E2 PRESSURE MAKES DIAMONDSS1 E3 EVERYTHING'S FINE AND WE'RE SHIPPING ON TIMES1 E4 WE ARE DEFINITELY IN THE FOURTH QUARTER
chinese_title: It's in the Game: Madden NFL Season 1
